Module project
Package model

Class Loader

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Loader
  • public class Loader
extends java.lang.Object
    Loader represent player's loader and contains ammo available to reload weaponsCard, a Player can ask for ammo o give back to his AmmoPool

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Loader()
      initialize loader with an ammo for each color

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void ammoToPool​(int blueAmmo, int redAmmo, int yellowAmmo)
      puts used ammo back in the pool until they will be recharged in the loader
      void askReload​(int blueAmmo, int redAmmo, int yellowAmmo)
      asks to ammoPool ammo to reload, for example after drawing an ammoCard, and insert them in the appropriate loader
      boolean canPay​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> cost)  
      boolean canPayAll​(java.util.List<OptionalEffect> opt)

      calculates blue ammo in the loader

      • askReload

        public void askReload​(int blueAmmo,
                      int redAmmo,
                      int yellowAmmo)
        asks to ammoPool ammo to reload, for example after drawing an ammoCard, and insert them in the appropriate loader
        Parameters:
        blueAmmo - number of blue ammo requested
        redAmmo - number of red ammo requested
        yellowAmmo - number of yellow ammo requested

      • ammoToPool

        public void ammoToPool​(int blueAmmo,
                       int redAmmo,
                       int yellowAmmo)
        puts used ammo back in the pool until they will be recharged in the loader
        Parameters:
        blueAmmo - number of blue ammo to put in the pool
        redAmmo - number of red ammo to put in the pool
        yellowAmmo - number of yellow ammo to put in the pool
